Number of players: 4+

Alias is a word game that you play in turns.

In Alias you have to say a term in other words, using synonyms, opposites or clues so that your team mate guess as many words as possible.

Before the beginning you can customize length of the turn, goal result and corpus.

You collect 1 point each time your team mate answers a term correctly and lose 1 point when you decide to give up and move on the next term.

Players must not use any part of the term, a derivate of it nor gestures(if you do so you might be forced by opponents to press Wrong Button).

The team who reaches a goal result first is the winner.

Tips: Keep both hands on the phone to avoid gestures. 

When there is less than 10 seconds left, consider about pressing wrong button because there might not be enough time to guess the next word
